name: 8th International Congress on Stroke and Neurology
content: Keywords: in stroke, stroke conference, Neurology, Neurology conference, Neuroscience, Neuroscience conference, brain conference, Stroke 2018, stroke conference 2018, stroke conference, Brain Haemorrhage conferences, stroke conferences, stroke congress, stroke event, stroke meeting Our organisation feels great to invite participants of all over the world for 8th International Congress on Stroke and Neurology with the theme of Modern Diagnosis and Adaptive treatments for Stroke and Neurological Disorders which will held on November 19-20, 2018 at Paris, France which includes keynote presentations, Poster presentation, Workshops, Oral talks and Exhibitions.
organizers: 8th International Congress on Stroke and Neurology
